Room.Name: Bed of Hot Coals
Room.ShortDescription: You are standing in the middle of a bed of glowing coals.
Room.LongDescription: The heat sears and swirls around you but strangely you are unharmed by it. It's difficult to see through the wavering heat flow, but a shirtless black man is apparently standing in the midst of the flames, totally untouched by the blistering heat. He seems to have a protective aura around him that is also enveloping you.
